title: AI recommendation engine
description: Implement AI recommendation engine that analyzes user behavior patterns and preferences to deliver personalized content suggestions with real-time learning capabilities
iWant: to receive personalized AI-powered recommendations based on my behavior and preferences
soThat: I can discover relevant content efficiently and improve my overall platform experience
acceptanceCriteria: System analyzes user interaction patterns and generates personalized recommendations
Recommendation accuracy improves over time through machine learning feedback loops
API responds with recommendations within 200ms for optimal user experience
System handles cold start scenarios for new users with default recommendation strategies
Recommendation engine supports A/B testing for algorithm optimization
User interface displays recommendations with clear relevance indicators
System gracefully degrades when ML services are unavailable
Privacy controls allow users to opt-out of behavioral tracking
technicalNotes: Requires integration with existing user analytics pipeline and content classification system. Consider using collaborative filtering combined with content-based approaches.
